short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to practice English and Turkish word matches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your language learning experience with Memoreng! This handy tool is designed to help you practice and improve your English and Turkish vocabulary through interactive exercises.

Features:

Interactive Vocabulary Practice: Randomly generates English words and provides multiple Turkish translations. Select the correct translation to improve your vocabulary.
Customizable Word Lists: Use your own Google Sheets to customize the words you practice. Simply enter the Google Sheets URL and your Google Sheets API key in the extension settings, and the extension will fetch the words directly from your sheet.
Instant Feedback: Receive immediate feedback on your answers to help you learn more effectively.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and modern design ensures a smooth user experience.
How to Use:

Add Words:

Create a Google Sheets document with English words in column A and their Turkish translations in column B.
Share the Google Sheets document as "Anyone with the link can view".
Copy the shareable link.
Set Up the Extension:

Click on the extension icon in your Chrome browser.
Go to the settings page by clicking on the "Settings" button.
Paste the Google Sheets URL and your Google Sheets API key into the provided fields and save.
Get Your Google Sheets API Key:

Go to the Google Cloud Console.
Create a new project or select an existing project.
Navigate to "APIs & Services" > "Library" and enable the Google Sheets API.
Go to "APIs & Services" > "Credentials" and create an API key.
Copy the API key and paste it into the extension settings along with the Google Sheets URL.
Start Practicing:

Open the extension popup.
A random English word will appear with multiple Turkish translation options.
Select the correct translation and get instant feedback.
Privacy and Security:

We value your privacy. Memoreng only accesses the data in your Google Sheets document to provide vocabulary exercises. No data is shared or stored outside your browser.

Support:

If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us at alpyurtseven99@gmail.com
